description: ajax_console_proxy_port needs to be an integer.  It is declared as a string, which means that the daemon won't start if you try to set the flag at all.
title: ajax_console_proxy_port needs to be an integer

comments.content: ajax_console_proxy_port needs to be an integer.  It is declared as a string, which means that the daemon won't start if you try to set the flag at all.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor

comments.content:
Hello Ewan, or anyone else affected,

Accepted nova into oneiric-proposed, the package will build now and be available in a few hours. Please test and give feedback here. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/EnableProposed for documentation how to enable and use -proposed. Thank you in advance!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pitti
